title: Pizza Fusion
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of organic and eco-friendly pizzeria franchise, Pizza Fusion. At this location you will find a range of pizzas, salads, sandwiches, and desserts. The menu also offers a soy mozzarella cheese for pizza that's vegan and non-casein. All the breads and sauces are vegan. Has vegan desserts, plus gluten-free pizza crust option. Delivery is made in hybrid vehicles.
